item.title: 100 vehicles pile up in Michigan crash as snowstorm moves across the country
item.description: More than 100 vehicles smashed into each other or slid off the interstate in Michigan as snow fueled by the Great Lakes blanketed the state

item.title: US citizen says ICE removed him from his Minnesota home in his underwear after warrantless search
item.description: Federal immigration agents have detained a U.S. citizen in Minnesota at gunpoint without a warrant

item.title: Sheinbaum reassures Mexico after US military movements spark concern
item.description: Mexico is showing sensitivity to U.S. military movements since the attack earlier this month on Venezuela
